titleStmt.title: An entry from the Journals of Hensley Henson

sourceDesc.bibl: Edited from the manuscripts in the custody of Durham Cathedral Library.

p.hi: I left York at 10.10 a.m. and arrived at Hereford about 6 p.m. travelling via Birmingham & Droitwich. There was a wait of 1 1/2 hours at Birmingham. I found a mass of letters mostly displeasing, and Geordie Gore arrived for a visit.
